Package chessapi4j.functional

Class Factory

  • java.lang.Object
    • chessapi4j.functional.Factory
  • public class Factory
extends Object
    Main factory class for the functional API. Provides convenience methods for creating Position, Generator and Move instances. Some methods for moves are optimized to avoid creating new instances, resulting in less garbage collection.
    Since:
    1.2.9
    Author:
    lunalobos

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static Generator generator()
      Generator class is a singleton class.
      static Move move​(int origin, int target)
      Creates a move from the origin and target square
      static Move move​(int origin, int target, int promotionPiece)
      Creates a move from the origin and target square, and a promotion piece
      static Move move​(long move, int origin)
      Creates a move from a bitboard representation and origin square.
      static Move move​(long move, int origin, int promotionPiece)
      Creates a move from a bitboard representation, origin square, and promotion piece.
      static Move move​(Square origin, Square target)
      Creates a move from the origin and target square
      static Move move​(Square origin, Square target, Piece promotionPiece)
      Creates a move from the origin and target square
      static Move move​(String move, boolean whiteMove)
      Takes a move string (UCI notation) and a boolean indicating the player who moves and return the move representation.
      static PGNMove pgnMove​(String move, Position position)
      Takes a move string (SAN notation) and the position from which the move came and returns a PGNMove instance.
      static Position position​(String fen)
      Takes a FEN string and returns a Position instance
      static Optional<Position> safePosition​(String fen)
      Takes a FEN string and returns a Position instance if the FEN is valid.
      static Position startPos()
      Starter position.

    • Method Detail

      • generator

        public static Generator generator()
        Generator class is a singleton class. This method provides the instance.

        There is no state in this class, so all methods are thread-safe.

        Returns:
        the Generator instance

      • safePosition

        public static Optional<Position> safePosition​(String fen)
        Takes a FEN string and returns a Position instance if the FEN is valid.
        Parameters:
        fen - the FEN string
        Returns:
        a Position instance wrapped in an Optional

      • position

        public static Position position​(String fen)
        Takes a FEN string and returns a Position instance
        Parameters:
        fen - the FEN string
        Returns:
        a Position instance

      • startPos

        public static Position startPos()
        Starter position.
        Returns:
        the starter position

      • move

        public static Move move​(int origin,
                        int target)
        Creates a move from the origin and target square
        Parameters:
        origin - the origin square, given as an integer in the 0-63 range
        target - the target square, given as an integer in the 0-63 range
        Returns:
        a Move instance
        Since:
        1.2.10

      • move

        public static Move move​(long move,
                        int origin)
        Creates a move from a bitboard representation and origin square.
        Parameters:
        move - the bitboard representation of the move
        origin - the origin square, given as an integer in the 0-63 range
        Returns:
        a Move instance

      • move

        public static Move move​(long move,
                        int origin,
                        int promotionPiece)
        Creates a move from a bitboard representation, origin square, and promotion piece.
        Parameters:
        move - the bitboard representation of the move
        origin - the origin square, given as an integer in the 0-63 range
        promotionPiece - the promotion piece, given as the ordinal value of the equivalent Piece or -1 for no promotion
        Returns:
        a Move instance

      • move

        public static Move move​(int origin,
                        int target,
                        int promotionPiece)
        Creates a move from the origin and target square, and a promotion piece
        Parameters:
        origin - the origin square, given as an integer in the 0-63 range
        target - the target square, given as an integer in the 0-63 range
        promotionPiece - the promotion piece, given as the ordinal value of the equivalent Piece or -1 for no promotion
        Returns:
        a Move instance
        Since:
        1.2.10

      • move

        public static Move move​(String move,
                        boolean whiteMove)
        Takes a move string (UCI notation) and a boolean indicating the player who moves and return the move representation.
        Parameters:
        move - the move string in UCI notation
        whiteMove - the player who moves
        Returns:
        a Move instance

      • pgnMove

        public static PGNMove pgnMove​(String move,
                              Position position)
        Takes a move string (SAN notation) and the position from which the move came and returns a PGNMove instance.
        Parameters:
        move - the move in SAN notation
        position - the position before the move
        Returns:
        a PGNMove instance
